name: Jack Robot Robot Destroyer
description:
Play as a little robot who can disassemble itself to overcome puzzles and obstacles!

Sometimes it's better to stay joined together, but not always.

-= Controls =-

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

E - interact

Left click - Detach body part

HOLD W - teleport back to legs (if stuck)

-------------------

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Created by - Jack

Design and level help - Tyler

Sound effects - Jared
